name: PlayerGold Wallet Portable
description: Portable distribution of PlayerGold Wallet with integrated blockchain node and automatic P2P bootstrap

contents.wallet: Electron wallet application with React UI
contents.backend: Python blockchain node with P2P networking
contents.launchers: Platform-specific startup scripts with environment detection
contents.readme: Comprehensive user documentation in Spanish and English
contents.dataStructure: Automatic data directory creation and management

supportedPlatforms: Other Linux distributions with Python 3.8+ and Node.js 16+
